name: Blue & Orange Visual Novel Demo
description:
Orange is making bad puns, but does Blue like them? That´s up to you!

Made for Stop Waiting For Godot Jam in about 3 days.

Playing the game on a computer is recommended, as there are some issues with the game on touchscreens.

We challenged ourselves to make a simple video game with Godot without any prior coding knowledge, and this is the result.
We used GDQuest's 2D Visual Novel Demo as a template, and modified it to fit our needs.

Thanks for checking out our game! Please let us know your thoughts by leaving a comment below!
